Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC) can flexibly switch between the electrolysis mode and the fuel cell mode for electrical energy storage and power generation.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: For practical application, sweeping gas is needed to bring in the reactants and take out the products timely.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: In this study, we use steam as anode sweeping gas in electrolysis to decrease the overpotential loss and collect pure O2, which is then used as the fuel cell cathode oxidant.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: The real fluctuating power generated from solar photovoltaic is used as the power supply, which allows rSOC to generate H2 from 6:45 a.m. to 5:45 p.m. and produce electricity in the night.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: Compared with the conventional strategy, the proposed system can utilize more than 35% electricity in electrolysis, and its efficiency and total H2 production can be increased by 8% and 50%, respectively.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: The total power generation and the power density are also increased by 290% and 160%, respectively.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: Overall, this new strategy results in a doubled round-trip voltage efficiency due to the much-decreased overpotential losses in the electrochemical processes.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation

Sentencas: This study provides a guidance for the optimization of practical rSOC application with dynamic operating conditions.
Titulo: Dynamic simulation of a reversible solid oxide cell system for efficient H2 production and power generation
